channel.title: Half life source gmod npc issue
channel.description: I appear to not be able to load the Half life souce npcs in gmod is this intentional or a problem with my gmod i really want to kill scientists but i cant find them in npc menu. Help me or give me insight i can load the maps though. Is this an issue with Half life source or something.

item.title: Half life source gmod npc issue
item.dc:creator: Carl
item.description:
There are many other software for this purpose… But that is the best one that you are recommending…

Read full topic
item.source: Half life source gmod npc issue

item.title: Half life source gmod npc issue
item.dc:creator: D4RKN3SS
item.description:
λdam:

You need Half Life Source.
And it has to be a legit copy purchased through Steam.

Also, Have you downloaded the HL[noparse]:S[/noparse] NPC’s from the Gmod Website?

I have A lEGIT Full version from steam i can spawn ragdolls from HLS though
Also ty for half life renisance

Read full topic
item.source: Half life source gmod npc issue

item.title: Half life source gmod npc issue
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Download Half-Life Renaissance.

It’s better than whatever crap you got tricked into downloading. Make sure you install addons correctly and always read the instructions.
